summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Renton Avenue from Henderson Street to the south line of Section 2, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; of Willamette Meridian; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8388 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
